headline: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP): Assessing Valuation After a Year of Slower Share Price Momentum
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) has quietly lagged the broader market this year, with the stock down about 12% year to date even as its underlying business keeps posting steady revenue and earnings growth. See our latest analysis for Keurig Dr Pepper. That share price softness has come even as the stock logged a 4.0% 1 month share price return and a modest 3.1% 3 month share price return, while the 1 year total shareholder return of about minus 11% shows momentum has been fading rather than...
